Title: Do you need third-party anti-virus software on a Mac?
Description:
For many years, it was accepted wisdom that Mac malware wasn’t really an issue.
One of the reasons for that was that the market share was simply too low to make it a worthwhile target for attackers.
Today, of course, is a very different world.

Title: Earthquakes Release Energy Mostly Through Heat, Not Ground Shaking
Description:
Up to 98 percent of the energy of an earthquake goes into flash heating rocks, not shaking the ground, new research shows.
The finding could help yield better earthquake forecasts

Title: Mary Roach’s New Book Replaceable You Explores Challenges in Replacing Body Parts
